description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Seeds of Ralark is 2D, side-scrolling adventure. Players assume the role of a lizard-like creature known as a Lotong, who has been banished from his village high in the tree tops of the Great Thick jungle. With only his native abilities such as a sticky tongue and feet, players must use a combination of skill and logic to navigate and survive the tree tops.
description.short: Seeds of Ralark is 2D, side-scrolling adventure. Players assume the role of a lizard-like creature known as a Lotong, who has been banished from his village high in the tree tops of the Great Thick jungle. With only his native abilities such as a sticky tongue and feet, players must use a combination of skill and logic to navigate and survive the tree tops.
